title: Epic Showdown in the League of Legends Arena!

registrationInfo: Registration is open. Join now to secure your place in the tournament.

description: Experience the thrill of CS:GO in its purest form. Can you conquer the competition? Get ready for high-stakes action and intense battles.

description: Dive into the world of Fortnite Battle Royale. Be the last player standing and claim the Victory Royale. Join the battle and seize glory!
registrationInfo: Registration is open. Don't miss your chance to become a Fortnite legend.

description: Show off your creativity and building skills in our Minecraft competition. Prizes await the best creators. Will you be among them?
